If your BMI* is over 38 you 
will receive extra support 
throughout your pregnancy as 
part of the weigh to a healthy 
pregnancy programme to help 
ensure the best outcome for 
you and your baby.
*BMI is a calculation that health 
professionals use to work out whether 
a person is a healthy weight. It is 
calculated by weight in kilograms
